fields.headline: Superhero Movie
fields.bodyText: "Is Leslie Nielsen still alive?" marvelled one film-goer, scanning the credits of the latest, barrel-scraping spoof from the David Zucker/Naked Gun stable. No such doubts about the franchise itself - this formula has officially flat-lined. Still, here comes Nielsen, his one-liners more dead than pan these days as as he groggily goes through the motions as the lecherous uncle of a nerdy crime fighter (Drake Bell). Oh please God, let it end. Every scene is like witnessing a tiny murder in which an enfeebled gag is wheeled out, tortured for a spell and then mercifully laid to rest.
